page.title: 10EVENTS,BATH 1985
page.content: Bath-{Britain in Bloom}holders and seven times winners _ had a feast of fun,entertainment and beauty in store for everyone during the {Floral {Festival}from July 7 to 13. The festival was officially opened by the {Mayor,}Mrs Jan Hole, in the Abbey {Churchyard}.The city was a riot of colour ,delighting the thousands of eager-eyed tourists. {The Great Sedan Chair Race}was held on Saturday, July 13.Organised by Bath and District Round Table and the City of Bath,it was held to raise money for{Multiple Sclerosis.}Starting at 6pm, teams raced from the{Abbey {Churchyard }to{ Royal Crescent, The {Circus, Assembly Rooms, Royal Mineral {Water Hospital, Theatre Royal,Cross {Bath,Pump Room}and back into {Abbey {Churchyard}to finish in{Parade {Gardens.
